alert.note: Alert for Cheshire; Eastern Hillsborough; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 9:20AM EST until January 10 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph after the snow has fallen. * WHERE...Western and Central Hillsborough, Cheshire, and Eastern Hillsborough Counties. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 7 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The potential exists for snowbands that will bring periods of locally heavy snowfall, which will lead to rapid snow accumulations and extremely dangerous travel conditions. Impacts to the evening commute are likely. Snow will change over to rain causing a period of slushy roads that will lead to extremely slick conditions. Plan on delaying travel to allow time for road conditions to improve.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org

area.areaDesc: Cheshire; Eastern Hillsborough; Western And Central Hillsborough
